Text:
thanks GIANNIS511! this storyline continues to impress me. i have some nitpicky concerns (like why is sam calling 'berto "robby") but overall it's turning into a fascinating arc.

continuing what i talked about in the comments of issue 1, i noticed a specific out-of-context phrase in this issue's script: "new universe"
what program do i use to view this?
Well you can use comical. At least that's what I use.
